attributes.action: amend the recent smoking ban to allow pubs, bars and clubs to provide dedicated enclosed smoking areas with proper air extraction and ventilation which can also be areas that staff do not service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A dedicated area with proper air extraction and ventilation will have no impact on non smokers espeacially if this area is serviced by smokers themselves. It is claimed that smoking costs the NHS £2 billion yet the government receives £8 billion in tax. If everybody stopped smoking overnight there would be severe adverse tax implications for the rest of the population. It is unfair to be punished for smoking in what is meant to be a free country if it harms no one else.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
